response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire our flagship product, which has been meticulously designed and developed to meet your specific needs and exceed your expectations. This product holds immense value to me, reflecting years of dedication and innovation. Given its significance, I am extending this exclusive offer to you at a price of $1,200,000. This amount encapsulates not only the cost of production but also the unique value it holds for you, estimated at $1,500,000. I believe this offer strikes a balance between fairness and profitability for both parties. Please let me know if you would like to discuss this further or if there's any way I can assist you in making a decision.", "product_price": 1200000}
